Title: Get Smart
Overview: When the identities of secret agents from Control are compromised, the Chief promotes hapless but eager analyst Maxwell Smart and teams him with stylish, capable Agent 99, the only spy whose cover remains intact. Can they work together to thwart the evil plans of KAOS and its crafty operative?
Keywords: dancing, spy, terrorist, traitor, airplane, violin, based on tv series, legs
production_companies: Village Roadshow Pictures, Atlas Entertainment, Mosaic Media Group, Mad Chance, Warner Bros., WV Films IV, Mel's Cite du Cinema, Callahan Filmworks
Cast: Steve Carell, Anne Hathaway, Dwayne Johnson
